start.title: Digital Movement Defense
start.description: Hi! You'd like to help support and defend Water Protectors, and that's awesome. There are some security steps you might want to take to protect yourself, your comrades, and you loved ones.

nextSteps.prompt: Why? What do we have to worry about? Why not just use gmail?

learnMore.title: Why use these complicated tools?
learnMore.description: The legacy of repression against indiginous and earth liberation movements is vast and brutal. Because these movements pose a fundamental challenge to the status quo, they have long been targets of coordinated and illegal targeting by federal law enforcement. By joining this struggle, you will have access to sensitive informatin that could put you or others at risk. The onboarding process is an introduction to more secure forms of communication that we can use to communicate effectively away from the prying eyes of the state.
